title: Plumbing Administration
body: User note: Code change proposals to this chapter will be considered by the IRC- Plumbing and Mechanical Code Development Committee during the 2015 (Group A) Code Development Cycle. See explanation on page iv.

title: Scope General
body: The provisions of Chapter 1 of the Building Code, Title 12-A DCMR shall establish the general administrative requirements applicable to plumbing systems and inspection requirements of the Residential Code. The administrative provisions of Chapter 1 of the Building Code, Title 12-A DCMR, shall also apply to the plumbing requirements of Chapters 25 through 32.
